featured.text: Which of the following is closest in meaning to the word “undertones” in the first paragraph? (A) Consequences.

definition.zh_def: 潛在的意義或情感，通常不明顯或隱藏的。
definition.en_def: A subtle or underlying quality, meaning, or emotion that is not immediately obvious.
definition.example: Her voice had an undertone of sadness that made me wonder what she was really feeling.
